questions.question: Although the ocean is one continuous body of water, oceanographers have divided it into four principal areas:

choices.answer: The Atlantic, North Atlantic, Pacific, and Indian Oceans
The Northern, Southern, Atlantic, and Pacific Oceans
The Pacific, Atlantic, Indian, and Arctic Oceans
The Atlantic, Pacific, Southern, and Arctic Oceans
